headline: PlayCTF – An open source Jeopardy style CTF creation and management platform
description:
CTFs are much more than just an event or a competition, they are an adventure. And being able to host them on a great open source platform with ease adds to the fun.

SDSLabs is proud to announce the release of playCTF, a Jeopardy-style CTF challenge deployment and management platform. Its intuitive and user-friendly deployment interface enables anyone to set up a CTF competition in a couple of minutes.

playCTF incorporates BEAST, our CTF creation platform, which provides container-based isolation of each challenge.

Check it out on playctf.sdslabs.co.

Experience playCTF on the playCTF playground (playground-playctf.sdslabs.co), or have a peek at the source code on github.com/sdslabs/playctf.

Also, check out the Beast GitHub repository and the Beast User Documentation (beast.sdslabs.co),

Give it a chance, and Beast will surely live up to it's name for you!

Made with :heart: by SDSLabs

Intrigued and wanna chat more with the team behind it? chat.sdslabs.co and our Discord (discord.gg/dXkVEgTPu9) is open to all visitors and questions
